   ID Index        Position       Token
                                  PackageHeader()
                                  importList
      [0..56]      [1:1..3:2]     KlassDeclaration(fun String extension1 String)
      [58..130]    [5:1..8:6]     KlassDeclaration(val String extension2 String)
